Murieta Walkthrough

The South Side

Sunday, Jan 7, 2001

I’m including everything I found during the walkthroughs including "long-term" projects. I’ll indicate these as LT (indicating they won’t get fixed immediately and might need board approval, but nevertheless good things to get on our radar if not already). Sometimes I’ll indicate "north", "east", etc, stairways. This of course is relative to the building itself (and I apologize for not specifying to the level of, say, "northwest").

  1. 39975 (building 1)

General
  • Hanging (suspended) light between buildings 1 & 4 burnt out.
  • Outside stairway area (east side, towards Cedar) is dirty between 1st and 2nd floors.
  • Inside elevator, door and "no smoking" sign scratched.
  • Entrance tiles (outside entrance/intercom area) are filthy
  • Entrance walls are dirty, with snails (LT? – at least try cleaning as much as possible)
  • Fountain area dirty, and the fountain is barely running.
  • Dim light near fountain area (one of the small wall lights in that area)
  • Inside stairways – graffiti on inside of 2nd floor door. Dirty carpet between 2nd and 3rd floor.

1st Floor
  • Door handle, East side entrance, scraped.
  • Overlay rug, east side entrance, dirty
  • Screens lying outside West entrance
  • Carpet dirty near unit 140
  • Outside stair area, south side, dirty. Also dirty on stairs between 1st and 2nd floors.
  • Shopping carts near elevator and inlet patio areas.

2nd Floor
  • Dirty carpet near units 239, 237, 232, and slightly dirty near 230 & 229.
  • Dirty tiles and rugs near elevator
  • Dirty tiles near 237 (inlet area)
  • Dirty screens near 232 (facing West)

3rd Floor

  • Dirty outside stairway between 2nd & 3rd floors.
  • Shopping cart near window area – facing West.
  • Carpet stains near 335 & 337.
  • Carpet and tiles dirty near elevator.

 

  1. 39997 (building 2)

General
  • Gate entrance area between buildings 1 & 2:
  1. Facing the gate entrance, walls very dirty on left side.
  2. Gate door squeaks
  3. Hanging light burnt out
  4. Lamp light near fountain burnt out.
  • In front of building 2 entrance (intercom area):
  1. Hanging (suspended) light burnt out
  2. Right lamp light needs to have tree pruned around it.
  3. Palm tree – left side – has dead debris.
  • Fountain area:
  1. Fountain doesn’t work.
  2. Light inside the fountain burnt out.

    3. c) Wall light near fountain is burnt out.

  3. A dolly found near the fountain
  • Inner stairway:
  1. Missing "Floor 2" sign (LT?)
  2. Near 2nd floor, dirty woodwork and paint on it.
  3. Woodwork chipping (LT)

1st Floor
  • Dirty tiles near the elevator
  • Dirty carpet near units 150, 153, and 145.
  • Dirty carpet near Northwest entrance.

2nd Floor
  • Fluorescent light burnt out – outside stairway area, south side.
  • Dirty carpet near 247, 248, 250 & 254.
  • Dirty tiles near elevator.
  • Dirty overlay rug near North side entrance.
  • Very dirty fluorescent light (and almost burnt out) – outside 2nd floor stairway area (North side)

3rd Floor
  • Dirty carpets near 350, 353, and near utility room.
  • Dirty outside stairs between 2nd & 3rd floors, South area.
  • Dirty tiles, inlet area near utility room (203).

 

  1. 39953 (building 3)

General
  • Gateway entrance between buildings 3 & 4:
  1. Tiles (inside gate area) have skid marks, dragged trash marks, or whatever.
  2. Hanging light is burnt out
  • Inside of elevator is dirty
  • Fountain isn’t working
  • Burnt out lamp in front of door (intercom) entrance.
  • Inside stairways:
  1. Stairs dirty between 1st and 2nd floor.
  2. Walls a little dirty here as well.
  • Tiles near front entrance are dirty.
  • Intercom area dirty

1st Floor
  • Tiles leading up to elevator are dirty (incl skid or trash marks)
  • Exterior wooden door (East side entrance) is peeling (LT).

2nd Floor
  • Shopping cart – outside, south stairway area
  • Lots of dirt on carpet near 223 and telephone equipment room (302). Dirty carpet in front of 222.
  • Tiles dirty in front of elevator
  • Fluorescent light, south stairway area, filthy.

3rd Floor
  • Dirty carpets in front of 320, 321, 327, and near utility room.
  • South outside stairway a little dirty between 3rd & 2nd floor.
  • Foot marks on outside elevator door.
  • Tiles dirty – outside, north stairway area.
  • Fluorescent light burnt out – Outside, north stairway area.
  • Some fluorescent lights, inside, are filthy!

39931 (building 4)

General
  • Lamp light (2nd to left from 3/4 gate entrance) needs branches cut away from it.
  • Tiles dirty near intercom area
  • Fountain partially working, light is out.
  • Elevator (inside) is dirty)
  • Interior stairways:
  1. Missing "floor" 1 & 2 signs.
  2. Garbage on 2nd floor
  • Area between buildings 1 & 4:
  1. Hanging light burnt out
  2. Lots of leaves between buildings 1 & 4 tile areas, near fountain.

1st Floor
  • Collect garbage near elevator (overflowing).
  • Fluorescent light burnt out – outside, east stairway area (near Cedar), between 1st & 2nd floor.
  • Very dirty stairs, outside south (west) stairway area, between 1st & 2nd floors.
  • Very dirty stairs in north stairway area, between 1st and 2nd floors.
  • Overlay rug near Northwest entrance (1st floor) is very dirty.

2nd Floor
  • Windows dirty – facing West (inlet area)
  • Fluorescent light container removed, near 209.
  • Shopping cart – east side
  • Dirty carpet in front of 214.
  • Very dirty carpet near 215 & 216.
  • Fluorescent light filthy – outside, 2nd floor east stairway.

3rd Floor
  • Lights burnt out in outside east stairway area.
  • 2 shopping carts and plywood near utility room (403)
  • Carpet stains near 316, 310 all the way up to 306 and beyond (made by a bike, shopping cart, scooter, or whatever).
  • Shopping cart near 305
  • Bike skid near 303

 

Pool/Clubhouse area (South)

Outside Clubhouse
  • Palm leaves broken near clubhouse entrance
  • Lights burnt out near weight room & north gate entrance to pool.
  • Dirty walls near arch entrance to bathroom & outside shower area (LT)
  • Red tiles dirty near weight room.

Inside areas

  • Men’s bathroom: filthy floor
  • Sauna – graffiti scratch marks on ceiling woodwork (LT)
  • Inside shower – left shower doesn’t have powerful thrust
  • Cobwebs & dirt in bathroom/sauna/hallway area.
  • Weight room:
  1. Lock is missing – door opens
  2. Lots of equipment broken (LT)

Hot tub (jacuzzi)
  • lukewarm
  • Need new plastic cover (Very dirty, unsanitary)
  • Fluorescent light near hot tub filthy
  • Red tiles near hot tub filthy
  • Walls near hot tub filthy (LT)

Pool furniture
  • Get new equipment! (broken recliner straps, check out umbrellas, seats, etc.) – LT

We also need more light near the pool – i.e.. near 3 palm trees, south side just outside the pool area. Maybe install a new light fixture. (LT)
